name: PIBE
description:
It's time to explore the ocean and go on an adventure. Beware of sharks, jellyfish and other scary sea creatures. Collect gold to explore the hidden depths, deeper and deeper until you find the lost treasure. 

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48.

  • Art: Ami
  • Code: Morgan
  • Music: https://www.bensound.com/

Controls:

WASD or arrows to move
